302001.name: Armor Enhancement
302001.description: Increases HP by {1}%, and blocks {0} damage when attacked. The damage blocking effect increases with the Rank. And for each Rank, blocks an additional {0} damage.

302002.name: Mountain Plating
302002.description: Blocks {0} damage when attacked. The damage blocking effect increases with the Rank. And for each Rank, blocks an additional {0} damage.

312002.name: Anti-Aircraft Ammunition
312002.description: Decreases ATK by {0}%, allowing Mountain to attack aerial targets.

1032002.name: Extended Range Ammo
1032002.description: Increases range by {0}, but decreases ATK by {1}%.

1102001.name: Energy Diffraction
1102001.description: Decreases Death Knell's range by {0} but allows Death Knell to fire {1} rays that each deal {2}% of their original damage

1201531.name: Wasp Production
1201531.description: Produces {1} Wasps to join the battle every {0}s for {2} times

1201532.name: Wraith Production
1201532.description: Produces {1} Wraiths to join the battle every {0}s for {2} times

1201681.name: Crawler Production
1201681.description: Produces {1} Crawlers to join the battle every {0}s for {2} times

1201682.name: Sledgehammer Production
1201682.description: Produces {1} Sledgehammer(s) to join the battle every {0}s for {2} times

1202001.name: Steel Ball Production
1202001.description: Produces {1} Steel Ball(s) to join the battle every {0}s for {2} times

1202002.name: Mustang Production
1202002.description: Produces {1} Mustangs to join the battle every {0}s for {2} times

1802153.name: Super Ignition
1802153.description: Attacks ignite the target unit. For {1}s, ignited units lose {0}% HP per second and cannot restore HP.

1803153.name: Super Photon Coating
1803153.description: Every {0}s, covers the unit with a photon coating, decreasing damage received by {2}% within {1}s and grants immunity to Electromagnetic, Ignited, Acid, and Degeneration Beam effects

1803541.name: Super Overload
1803541.description: Enters Overload state {0}s after the battle starts, increasing movement speed by {1}%, decreasing attack interval by {2}%, and granting immunity to Electromagnetic, Ignited, Acid, and Degeneration Beam effects.

1803671.name: Super Photon Coating
1803671.description: Cannot move, gains immunity to Electromagnetic, Ignited, Acid, and Degeneration Beam effects, and restores {1}% of Max HP within {0}s after the start of the battle.

1803672.name: Super Overload
1803672.description: Enters Overload state {0}s after the battle starts, increasing movement speed by {1}%, decreasing attack interval by {2}%, and granting immunity to Electromagnetic, Ignited, Acid, and Degeneration Beam effects.

1804168.name: Super Degeneration Beam
1804168.description: Projects a Degeneration Beam to enemy units within a range of {0}m. The affected enemy units' movement speed is reduced by {1}%, their ATK is reduced by {2}%, they cannot use Tech and take an additional {3}% damage when attacked.

1806153.name: Experimental Unit
1806153.description: Experimental units cannot operate stably and will begin to self-destruct {0} seconds after the battle begins: losing {1}% of HP per second.

1806167.name: Experimental Unit
1806167.description: Experimental units cannot operate stably and will begin to self-destruct {0} seconds after the battle begins: losing {1}% of HP per second.

1806168.name: Experimental Unit
1806168.description: Experimental units cannot operate stably and will begin to self-destruct {0} seconds after the battle begins: losing {1}% of HP per second.

11020012.name: Electromagnetic Bomb
11020012.description: Launches {1} electromagnetic shots at the enemy every {0}s. Each electromagnetic shot deals {2} damage to the Energy Shield, slows all hit units, and disables their Tech for {3}s. Electromagnetic shots have a range of {4}m

11020021.name: Gun-launched Missile
11020021.description: Launches a rocket from its arm cannons every {0} seconds. The rocket has a range of {2}, causing {4} damage to enemies within a {3}m radius of the hit point. Damage increases by {4} per unit Rank increased.

11020022.name: Smoke Bomb
11020022.description: Launches {1} Smoke Bombs towards the enemy every {0}s. The Smoke Bombs have a max range of {2}m and a minimum range of {3}m. The range of units within the smoke is reduced by {4}%.

18032002.name: Photon Loop
18032002.description: Every {0}s, covers the unit with a photon coating, decreasing damage received by {2}% within {1}s and grants immunity to Electromagnetic, Ignited, Acid, and Degeneration Beam effects
